00014 #ifndef ULIB_UXML2DOCUMENT_H
00015 #define ULIB_UXML2DOCUMENT_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/xml/libxml2/node.h>
00018 
00019 /*
00020 Represents an XML document in the DOM model.
00021 
00022 struct _xmlDoc {
00023         void*                                   _private;       // application data
00024         xmlElementType          type;       // XML_DOCUMENT_NODE, must be second !
00025         char*                                   name;                   // name/filename/URI of the document
00026         struct _xmlNode*        children;   // the document tree
00027         struct _xmlNode*        last;                   // last child link
00028         struct _xmlNode*        parent;         // child->parent link
00029         struct _xmlNode*        next;                   // next sibling link
00030         struct _xmlNode*        prev;                   // previous sibling link
00031         struct _xmlDoc* doc;                    // autoreference to itself
00032         // End of common part
00033         int compression;                                        // level of zlib compression
00034         int standalone;                                 // standalone document (no external refs)
00035                                                                                         //  1 if standalone = "yes"
00036                                                                                         //  0 if standalone = "no"
00037                                                                                         // -1 if there is no XML declaration
00038                                                                                         // -2 if there is an XML declaration, but no standalone attribute was specified
00039         struct _xmlDtd* intSubset;  // the document internal subset
00040         struct _xmlDtd* extSubset;  // the document external subset
00041         struct _xmlNs*          oldNs;          // Global namespace, the old way
00042         const xmlChar*          version;                // the XML version string
00043         const xmlChar*          encoding;   // external initial encoding, if any
00044         void*                                   ids;        // Hash table for ID attributes if any
00045         void*                                   refs;       // Hash table for IDREFs attributes if any
00046         const xmlChar*          URL;                    // The URI for that document
00047         int charset;                                            // encoding of the in-memory content actually an xmlCharEncoding
00048         struct _xmlDict*        dict;                   // dict used to allocate names or NULL
00049         void*                                   psvi;                   // for type/PSVI informations
00050         int parseFlags;                                 // set of xmlParserOption used to parse the document
00051         int properties;                                 // set of xmlDocProperties for this document set at the end of parsing
00052 };
00053 */
00054 
00055 class U_EXPORT UXML2Document {
00056 public:
00057 
00058         // Check for memory error
00059         U_MEMORY_TEST
00060 
00061         // Allocator e Deallocator
00062         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00063         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00064 
00065         // Costruttori
00066 
00067         UXML2Document()
00068                 {
00069                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Document, "", 0)
00070 
00071                 impl_ = (xmlDocPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewDoc, "%S", (xmlChar*)"1.0");
00072                 }
00073 
00074         UXML2Document(const UString& data);
00075 
00076         ~UXML2Document()
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UXML2Document)
00079 
00080                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlFreeDoc, "%p", impl_);
00081                 }
00082 
00083         // SERVICES
00084 
00085         static uint32_t getElement(const UString& data, UVector<UString>& velement, const char* tag, uint32_t tag_len);
00086 
00092         const char* getEncoding() const { return (const char*)impl_->encoding; }
00093 
00094         xmlDtdPtr getInternalSubset() const
00095                 {
00096                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::getInternalSubset()")
00097 
00098                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00099 
00100                 xmlDtdPtr dtd = (xmlDtdPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetIntSubset, "%p", impl_);
00101 
00102                 U_RETURN_POINTER(dtd,_xmlDtd);
00103                 }
00104 
00105         xmlDtdPtr setInternalSubset(const char* name, const char* external_id = 0, const char* system_id = 0)
00106                 {
00107                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::setInternalSubset(%S,%S,%S)", name, external_id, system_id)
00108 
00109                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00110 
00111                 xmlDtdPtr dtd = (xmlDtdPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlCreateIntSubset, "%p,%S,%S,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)name,
00112                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)external_id,
00113                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)system_id);
00114 
00115                 U_RETURN_POINTER(dtd,_xmlDtd);
00116                 }
00117 
00125         xmlNodePtr getRootNode() const
00126                 {
00127                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::getRootNode()")
00128 
00129                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00130 
00131                 xmlNodePtr root = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlDocGetRootElement, "%p", impl_);
00132 
00133                 U_RETURN_POINTER(root,_xmlNode);
00134                 }
00135 
00146         xmlNodePtr createRootNode(const char* name, const char* ns_uri = 0, const char* ns_prefix = 0)
00147                 {
00148                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::setInternalSubset(%S,%S,%S)", name, ns_uri, ns_prefix)
00149 
00150                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00151 
00152                 xmlNodePtr node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewDocNode, "%p,%p,%S,%S", impl_, 0, (const xmlChar*)name, 0);
00153 
00154                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlDocSetRootElement, "%p,%p", impl_, node);
00155 
00156                 xmlNodePtr root = getRootNode();
00157 
00158                 if (ns_uri) UXML2Node(root).setNameSpaceDeclaration(ns_uri, ns_prefix);
00159 
00160                 U_RETURN_POINTER(root,_xmlNode);
00161                 }
00162 
00171         xmlNodePtr createRootNodeByImport(const xmlNodePtr node, bool recursive = true)
00172                 {
00173                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::createRootNodeByImport(%p,%b)", node, recursive)
00174 
00175                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00176 
00177                 xmlNodePtr imported_node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlDocCopyNode, "%p,%p,%b", node, impl_, recursive);
00178 
00179                 if (imported_node) U_SYSCALL_VOID(xmlDocSetRootElement, "%p,%p", impl_, node);
00180 
00181                 xmlNodePtr root = getRootNode();
00182 
00183                 U_RETURN_POINTER(root,_xmlNode);
00184                 }
00185 
00193         xmlNodePtr addComment(const char* content)
00194                 {
00195                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::addComment(%S)", content)
00196 
00197                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00198                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_->doc)
00199 
00200                 xmlNodePtr node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlNewComment, "%S", (const xmlChar*)content);
00201 
00202                 // Use the result, because node can be freed when merging text nodes:
00203 
00204                 if (node) node = (xmlNodePtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddChild, "%p,%p", (xmlNodePtr)impl_, node);
00205 
00206                 U_RETURN_POINTER(node,_xmlNode);
00207                 }
00208 
00218         xmlEntityPtr setEntityDeclaration(const char* name, xmlEntityType type, const char* publicId, const char* systemId, const char* content)
00219                 {
00220                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::setEntityDeclaration(%S,%d,%S,%S,%S)", name, type, publicId, systemId, content)
00221 
00222                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00223 
00224                 xmlEntityPtr entity = (xmlEntityPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlAddDocEntity, "%p,%S,%d,%S,%S,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)name, type,
00225                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)publicId,
00226                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)systemId,
00227                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   (const xmlChar*)content);
00228 
00229                 U_RETURN_POINTER(entity,_xmlEntity);
00230                 }

00327         xmlEntityPtr getEntity(const char* name)
00328                 {
00329                 U_TRACE(1, "UXML2Document::getEntity(%S)", name)
00330 
00331                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(impl_)
00332 
00333                 xmlEntityPtr node = (xmlEntityPtr) U_SYSCALL(xmlGetDocEntity, "%p,%S", impl_, (const xmlChar*)name);
